scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development cd themes/blowfish && npx tailwindcss -c ./tailwind.config.js -i ./assets/css/main.css -o ../../assets/css/main.css -w
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production cd themes/blowfish && npx tailwindcss -c ./tailwind.config.js -i ./assets/css/main.css -o ../../assets/css/main.css --minify
